column1: At just 209 cm long, the Carrie2 is easy to park and nimble in tight spaces. Its slim box lets you weave through the city like a regular bike, while the powerful drive keeps you feeling light and agile, even when fully loaded.

column6: data-proportion=""true"" width=""400"" height=""auto"" data-size=""400px,auto"" data-align="""" data-index=""2"" data-file-name=""https://store-c8jhcan2jv.mybigcommerce.com/product_images/product_modules/Riese%20%26%20Muller/Carrie/Carrie2/feature/Carrie_Carrie2_feature_a-bike-for-anytime-anywhere.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" origin-size=""1600,1067"" data-origin=""400px,auto"">

column1: Built for the Future: Sustainable, Repairable, Ready for Anything

The Carrie2 is designed with circular principles in mind. Its minimalist frame – made from 80% recycled aluminium – is powder-coated for durability and reduced resource use. Every accessory, from the weatherproof child cover to the versatile Cargo bag, is easy to dismantle, clean, and repair, ensuring a long life and minimal waste.

column6: data-proportion=""true"" width=""400"" height=""auto"" data-size=""400px,auto"" data-align="""" data-index=""2"" data-file-name=""https://store-c8jhcan2jv.mybigcommerce.com/product_images/product_modules/Riese%20%26%20Muller/Carrie/Carrie2/feature/Carrie_Carrie2_feature_built-for-the-future-sustainable-repairable-ready-for-anything.gif"" data-file-size=""0"" origin-size=""1600,1067"" data-origin=""400px,auto"">

column1: RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the optionally integrated RX Chip and matching RX Service. Activate ConnectRide Free in the first year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics. To benefit permanently from this offer, you can then take advantage of the paid ConnectRide service.

column1: The Flex Box lives up to its name: compact when collapsed, spacious enough for up to three crates when extended. A zippered door makes access easy for children or pets, and it can be locked for security. Add flexibility with the Family, Dog, or Cargo kit.
